title: I have more IP than the game says I do.
body:
Hello everyone I appreciate the support you all give in this community.
I am having an issue where the game tells me I have 3164 IP, but the store is telling me I have around 2700 IP. 
All I want to do is play ADC Corki with my friend Alex but the game is not letting me buy him. For those who don't know he costs 3150 so I have enough.
If anyone knows of a fix to this problem, it would be appreciated if you posted a comment on this discussion page so I can fix this ASAP.
Thank you for the help,
Collin aka Scouter87 aka PoopyLord aka Collin

replies.body:
This is an issue we're currently tracking and trying to figure out its origins. For the moment, a lot of players have found that jumping back into the Legacy Client works for them. You can access this anytime from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
If you jump back to the old client it works as a short term solution.
